content: a lovely little bonnet that s quick and easy to knit perfect for autumn and springtime when knitted in cotton-merino mix or winter when made in a warmer merino or pure wool an elastic texture will make sure the bonnet sits well and fits long and it s reversible the bonnet is knitted back and forth in row until you reach the end of the neck when you join the work in round the layout of the printable pattern makes it easy to fold it and fit it into any project bag follow the folding lines as indicated and use the pattern in whatever way suits you best make sure you choose actual size when printing rather than fit to page to get the optimal result enjoy tilgjengelig også på norsk the pattern has now also been translated to danish and can be found here https //strikkeglad dk/32421/twister-2/
